author: Staff Reporter
text: It was quite an eventful day at the Madhuram Narayanan Centre for Exceptional Children. The school was holding its much awaited NutriFest, an event where parents brainstorm and create new and nutritional dishes for their children. “This year’s theme was Incorporation of Vegetables and Fruits in our Daily Diet,” said Vimala Kannan, Director of the Centre. Over 90 parents took part in the event, and were divided into three groups — birth to 2 years, 2 -4 years, and 4 -6 year, depending on their child’s age. —staff reporter
title: NutriFest held
